popularityCurve.label: they have the same hopes and dreams as all other children in america but they have a harder path to realizing their dreams

clusterList.phrase: they have the same hopes and dreams as all other children in america but they have a harder path to realizing their dreams
now that i have seen somalia for myself i feel it is important for the american public to remember that the somali people have the same dreams for their children that we do
